评论详情: I’m 5’3, 135 lbs, 36A cup, I notoriously wear a large in sport bras and anything that has a built in bra. However, I ordered this in a medium (and I never do this so I  immediately tried to change to a large but it was too late lol) after looking at reviews to make it more form fitting and the medium actually did turn out to be  perfect. Like others reviewers mentioned, this khaki leopard color is more like a brown leopard. Still cute, but darker. The quality is made really well, you can see that there are seams that reinforce the fabric so it lasts long. The torso area is comfy because there’s a little bit of room. The fit looks beautiful and I want to buy more. I can tell this won’t shrink. However, it is a little tight in the cup area even for my little A’s lol. larger cups beware…you could maybe feel too squished.
This is exactly what I have been looking for. It fits so well and holds the girls in. I feel great when I am wearing this. The support is great.

评论概述: This bra actually supports the bigger boobs.
评论详情: I'm 66, small framed but big breasted naturally so they are no longer where they should be.  Getting support without being 'strapped in' is almost non existent.  Over the past couple of years, I've tried every bra out there that isn't an underwire or having a back closure. NONE have worked.  Wearing a bra was the equivalent of wearing a tank under my clothes.  UNTIL I found this bra!!!  It's not only extremely comfortable, feels as if I'm not wearing a bra, but it actually has good support, not perfect but definitely supportive, and is even attractive.  Yes, it can be worn as a tank.  The only flaw I found is that the sides cut in under the arms so there's not full coverage for spillage.  I'll live with it.  And yes as others have said, the fabric is similar to that of a bathing suit. I have a 43" chest, am 5'3" and weigh 145 lbs and ordered the 44.  It fits perfectly.  Not tight and not loose and just right with the right amount of support.  The only other flaw is that it doesn't seem to come in enough neutral solid colors, lots of prints that I'm not sure would be seen through tops.  I can't attest to longevity as I just got them. I highly recommend!!

I did return this bra because it didn't fit me right BUT it was super cute and very good quality!  I reordered a different style from Oalka that fit me much better.  Love these bra's and they have matching leggings :)
I love this bra, it fits well, makes my boobs look good and provides support. I do have itty bitties so that's not super hard to do but this bra enhances them vs. flattening them.

评论概述: The band is a big issue.
类型: Size: MediumColor: Heart Floral Leaf White
评论详情: Literally and figuratively. I first ordered an extra large, which fit beautifully everywhere except for the band of the bra portion. It was so loose my boobs kept falling out the bottom. It was so very loose that I returned it and reordered a medium. Well, the band on this one is tight enough, but everything else is way tighter as well. I couldn't maneuver into it over my head so I had to put it on by stepping into it. That is not a big deal, but the way it gave me a bunch of cleavage I didn't really want and fit tightly enough everywhere that I'm not sure I can do yoga in it, which is what I bought it for, is a fair sized issue. I can't decide whether to keep this one, and the other in a different pattern that I noticed was only available in medium so I got it too, or return them for a large. I'm really doubtful the large would have a tight enough band, because the band on the medium is just barely tight enough. If I wanted to spend the money, I would reorder an extra large and have the band taken in. It's cute enough that I'm actually considering that. Darn that band, though.  Edited to add that the band on the large was more too large than the band on the medium, as I expected. I am in fact keeping the extra large and having my seamstress do something about the bra band, because it is just too cute. But they really need to reconsider their sizing on the bra band. Just the bra band

评论概述: YOU CAN STOP THE ROLL UP
评论详情: I love these shelf bra tops. So comfortable lots of stretch too but like others have said..it rolled at the bottom driving me crazy I HATED it doing that but it still was comfy to wear only having to constantly pull it down begin to bother me more. So I thought to myself..self 🤔 hmm you really love this top and you wear it a lot (as a bra) mostly under my shirts. What can be done to STOP the roll up? Then it came to me..ELASTIC IN THE BOTTOM! I was afraid at first of ruining this but happy it didn't stop me from trying because ladies guess what? It WORKED! All you need to do is cut two small slits on the bottom of the top either in front or back . Make sure you don't cut through just on the top level of the material. Like you see how sweat pants with a draw string is? Like that. Measure the amount of elastic you need by wrapping it around your ribs then pull it a little snug and cut the elastic. Get a safety pin and attach it to one end of the elastic and start threading it through. After that sew the two ends together and walla! Your top will not budge! Hope this helps some of you who have the problem with it rolling up. Make sure you cut your elastic as thin as the bottom of the bra so it will go through the slits. Also if you want try a draw string and tie it. I'd think that would work too but if not.. elastic will. Have a Blessed day 💖

I was disappointed that the pads on the bra weren’t sewn in… and have to be readjusted. It isn’t a no buy again problem but it would make it more user friendly, as they do come out in the wash. As for wearing the item: I love them, supportive for heavier chested women without the uniboob look. Comfy, pretty looking, and they make me feel confident.

评论概述: Follow the size chart they provide - read my review for clarification of their sizing
评论详情: The quality, fit and feel of this workout top is spot on.  The sizing is a little weird so be sure to look at their size chart and read my review about the odd sizing.  Tip: If you are in between sizes, size up.  Here is why: I'm 5'3 135 lbs and wear a 32DD/34D bra.  According to the chart a 32DD should get size Medium. But a 34D should get size Large. Most women know that 32DD and 34D are 'sister' sizes.  So in theory, they should both be the same size tank.  This is why I say sizing is a littler weird. They had me in two different sizes. So I ordered the Medium, because my true bra size is 32DD and all my other workout tops are medium.  This Medium turned out to be a bit too tight in the chest. So in hindsight I should have gone with the Large. I hope this helps other chesty ladies decide which size to choose.

评论概述: Good bra! Definitely recommend trying it out.
评论详情: I got this bra during a lightening deal because I really needed new bras... I’m a 36DD-DDD and have trouble finding bras I don’t spill out of and I bought this bra because of the reviews others had. For reference, I’m 5’7”, 170 lbs, and have kind of an athletic build. I’ll admit I do have some small spillage on the top (I got a size Large) however, if I got an XL I don’t think I would’ve had as good compression that I do with the size Large. The pads inside are helpful, but I personally remove them. The material of the bra is super comfortable and smooth, it’s my favorite aspect of the bra! I wouldn’t run in this bra necessarily, but as a larger chested woman I have that problem with almost every bra anyways lol.  Overall, it gives good compression and coverage! I think they are really flattering and cute as well! I can update this review once I do a couple of workouts in them too. But from what I feel about them so far, I’ll most likely get more colors! If you’re wondering if you should get one to try, I’d recommend buying it to try it out!  Update: I’ve worked out in these plenty of times and I really like them! I’ve even been able to jump rope wearing them and the compression is just enough to not be all over the place. I’ll most like order more :)

I went for a hike this am and it held up well. Dried quickly and offered great support for my 34C boobs. It can be styled for a regular outfit too. Definitely going to order more! I’m 5”5 170lbs for reference.

评论概述: I bought 3 tops from 3 different stores and they're virtually identical
评论详情: I was curious what the difference between these longline sports bras were, so I bought one from each of these stores: Gym People (pink $22.99), Stelle World (black $16.99), and Oalka (teal $18.99). They're virtually identical in fit. Moral of the story, you can probably just buy the cheaper option when you see similar options. I do think this teal one is a tiny bit tighter than the other ones. I'm 5'11" and about 170lbs. I have broad shoulders and some side-boob, so these cut in a bit in an unflattering way, but otherwise I enjoy the fit and feel of the fabric.
